```{r}
library(scales)
library(fivethirtyeight)
library(maps)
library(zipcode)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
states <- map_data("state")
ggplot(data = states) +
  geom_polygon(aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group), color = "white") +
  coord_fixed(1.3) +
  guides(fill = F)
```

```{r}
dt <- read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fivethirtyeight/data/master/alcohol-consumption/drinks.csv')

world <- map_data("world")

dt1 <- dt %>% select(country, spirit_servings)

  dt1 %>% right_join(world, by = c('country' = 'region')) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_polygon(aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group, fill = spirit_servings), color = "white")
```
